item.title: Summoning!
item.dc:creator: @shadow12 shadow12
item.description:
@shadow12 wrote:

HI

I’ve added summoning on testscape but it has the menu to summon on music player but everytime i try to summon it don’t work can some alter the code so it will work i
This is for one of the creatures if you fix leave below
[glow=red,2,300]This was taken from Cheezscape so thank the person he wrote this i just wanna get it too work [/glow]

case 1265: // Rock Crab (level 65) if(playerHasItemAmount(4278, 15) && playerHasItemAmount(555, 35)) { if(summonLevel >= 65) { deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 15); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 35); stillgfx(147, absY-1, absX); SummonNewNPC(NPCID); addSummonXP(325); sendMessage("You summon a rock crab!"); } else { sendMessage("You need a summoning level of 65 to cast this spell!"); } } else { sendMessage("You need 15 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 35 "+getItemName(555)+" to cast this spell!"); } break;

Read full topic
